snippet: A woman who claimed to have been intimidated by Oscar De La Hoya at a New York hotel has been ordered to pay his legal bill.
abstract: Manhattan Judge Paul Wooten orders model Angelica Cecora to pay legal bill of boxing champion Oscar De La Hoya after ruling that her harassment suit against him was frivolous.
lead_paragraph: A woman who claimed to have been intimidated by Oscar De La Hoya at a New York hotel has been ordered to pay his legal bill.

headline.seo: A Legal Victory for Oscar De La Hoya
headline.main: A Legal Victory for De La Hoya
headline.print_headline: Legal Victory for De La Hoya
